alert.note: Alert for Little Colorado River Valley in Apache County; Little Colorado River Valley in Coconino County; Little Colorado River Valley in Navajo County; Northeast Plateaus and Mesas Hwy 264 Northward; Northeast Plateaus and Mesas South of Hwy 264 (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Wind Advisory issued September 30 at 3:20AM MST until September 30 at 8:00PM MST by NWS Flagstaff
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 10 AM MST /11 AM MDT/ THIS MORNING TO 8 PM MST /9 PM MDT/ THIS EVENING... ...WIND ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 10 AM MST /11 AM MDT/ TO 8 PM MST /9 PM MDT/ SUNDAY... * WHAT...For the first Wind Advisory, south winds 20 to 30 mph with gusts up to 55 mph expected. For the second Wind Advisory, southwest winds 20 to 30 mph with gusts up to 50 mph expected. * WHERE...Northeast Plateaus and Mesas and Little Colorado River Valley. * WHEN...For the first Wind Advisory, from 10 AM MST /11 AM MDT/ to 8 PM MST /9 PM MDT/ Saturday. For the second Wind Advisory, from 10 AM MST /11 AM MDT/ to 8 PM MST /9 PM MDT/ Sunday. * IMPACTS...Gusty winds could blow around unsecured objects. In addition, winds this strong can make driving difficult, especially for high profile vehicles.
info.instruction: Use extra caution when driving, especially if operating a high profile vehicle. Secure outdoor objects.
